comment: Every set is well-founded, assuming the Axiom of Regularity. Proposition 9.13 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 78. This variant of ~ tz9.13g is useful in proofs of theorems about the rank function. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2003.)
